. In March, when the New York Times reported on the fracturing relationship between Apple and Google, Steve Jobs declined to comment. Eric Schmidt , meanwhile, was anything but cold, calculating, and distant. I continue to believe, as many do, that Steve Jobs is the best CEO in the world today, and I admire Apple and Steve Jobs enormously, Eric Schmidt declared. . Ken Auletta , author of ''Googled: The End of the World as We Know It,'' told Bloomberg TV last week that Eric Schmidt may be weighing a role in the administration of U.S. Barack Obama . Maybe he'll find some kind of astonishing offer, either at a startup or at a foundation or from a political unit, but today, he's hanging on to the right to define his job as he sees fit while continuing to make a pile of money, said Whit Andrews, a Shrewsbury, Massachusetts-based analyst at Gartner Google Inc.
